certificates.title: AWS Cloud Quest: Cloud Practitioner
certificates.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of AWS services and hands-on experience with compute, networking, databases, and security.

certificates.title: NDG Linux Essentials
certificates.description: Completed the NDG Linux Essentials course, showcasing foundational knowledge of the Linux operating system, command-line navigation, security, file permissions, and system management.

certificates.title: Python Programming Certificate
certificates.description: Completed a comprehensive course covering Python from basics to advanced topics, including data structures, OOP, database operations, Flask, Numpy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

certificates.title: CISCO Networking Devices and Initial Configuration
certificates.description: Completed a networking course covering essential network device configuration, IP addressing, and foundational concepts in cloud and virtualization

certificates.title: Unity Game Development
certificates.description: Completed a course on Unity game development, covering the basics of the engine and creating a 2D game to apply and solidify foundational skills.

certificates.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner-Discovery Day
certificates.description: Attended a training event covering the benefits of AWS Cloud computing and key services for compute, storage, databases, networking, and content delivery.

certificates.title: Lightroom Photo Editing
certificates.description: Completed a course on Adobe Lightroom, focusing on photo editing techniques and tools to enhance photography.

certificates.title: Magara Jam Attandance Bagde
certificates.description: Participated in a 48-hour game jam, creating a game from scratch based on a theme and constraints.

certificates.title: Artifical Intelligence Summer School
certificates.description: Participated in a Artifical Intelligence event  organized by the Yalova University.
